EnableHostEvent.label: Enable Host Events
EnableHostEvent.tooltip: If checked, host events will trigger the message

HostMessageTemplate.label: Host Message Template
HostMessageTemplate.tooltip:
$name = hosting channel name
$display_name = hosting user display name
$action = The event action: hosted or raided
$stream_team = Stream Team name
